members.member:
Hello my friend, you came here because you found a mapper that maps stuff and this given mapper is blocking you in your api development? Fear not!
Pls follow the instruktions given below:

member.name: M:SEIIApp.Server.Services.ChapterDefinitionService.GetAllChapters
